name: LeadConvertResult

methods.name: getAccountId
methods.description: The ID of the new account (if a new account was specified) or the ID of the account specified when convertLead was invoked.

methods.name: getContactId
methods.description: The ID of the new contact (if a new contact was specified) or the ID of the contact specified when convertLead was invoked.

methods.name: getErrors
methods.description: If an error occurred, an array of one or more database error objects providing the error code and description.

methods.name: getLeadId
methods.description: The ID of the converted lead.

methods.name: getOpportunityId
methods.description: The ID of the new opportunity, if one was created when convertLead was invoked.

methods.name: isSuccess
methods.description: A Boolean value that is set to true if the DML operation was successful for this object, false otherwise

description: The result of a lead conversion.
